summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of AI Automation guide. All major features working correctly including hero section, use cases with filtering, ROI calculator, tool comparison, implementation checklist, and floating navigation.

ui_bugs.issue: Phase buttons have overlapping elements causing click interference/timeouts

passed_tests: Hero section loads with 4 stats cards (15+ Use Cases, 60% Avg Cost Reduction, 8 Tools Compared, 6 Week Implementation)
Explore Use Cases button scrolls to use cases section correctly
Calculate ROI button scrolls to ROI calculator section correctly
15 use case cards display with icons, titles, ROI metrics, tools, and cost
Industry filter works (All: 15, Service: 11, Manufacturing: 10 cards)
Difficulty filter works (Easy: 5, Medium: 6, Hard: 4 cards)
ROI multiplier filter works (4x-6x: 7, 7x-10x: 5, 10x+: 4 cards)
Time saved slider filter works (reduces cards when moved higher)
Use case cards clickable and open modals with full details
Modal displays ROI metrics, implementation details, recommended tools
Modal close functionality works correctly
ROI Calculator inputs work (sliders for hours/tasks/efficiency, text inputs for rate/cost)
ROI Calculator displays real-time results (ROI %, hours saved, money saved, net savings, payback period)
Tool Comparison shows 8 tools with working category filters
Category tabs work (All Tools, LLM: 2, Automation: 2, Voice AI: 2, Vision AI: 1, AI Platform: 1)
Implementation Checklist shows 5 phases with progress tracking (0/20 tasks, 0% complete)
Checklist phases are expandable/collapsible with task lists
Task completion tracking works
Floating navigation appears on scroll with section links
Floating nav links work correctly for navigation
Scroll to top button appears and functions properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement: Fix phase button click interference in Implementation Checklist by adjusting z-index or element positioning to prevent overlapping divs from intercepting clicks. The functionality works but requires force clicking.
success_percentage: Frontend: 98% (all major features working, minor UI clicking issue)
